attributes.action: STOP TESTING ON KITTENS AT UNIVERSITIES
attributes.additional_details: After reading an article in the Metro newspaper about how this countries universities use kittens for testing and crack their skulls open and various other painful experiments i feel something needs to be done!! They are animals they have feelings and rights to not be harmed in such a cruel way!! would this country stand for tests to be done on people? NO so neither should it be done on poor defenseless little animals THIS HAS TO STOP - I create this petition in a bid for this to be stopped!
